Description: a characteristic, number or quantity that can be measured

Synonyms: cases, items, experimental units, observational units, records, statistical units, instances, examples
Description: individuals on which the observations are made
collection of observations made on one or more variables
variable that one wishes to predict
variables used to produce a mode to predict the response
a measure ranging between 0 and 1, with 1 indicating that the cases are closer
a measure where a smaller number means the cases are closer
